item.title: Color Mixer For My Children
item.description: Does this work?! ## Loading required package: xml2 ## PhantomJS not found. You can install it with webshot::install_phantomjs(). If it is installed, please make sure the phantomjs executable can be found via the PATH variable. Shiny applications not supported in static R Markdown documents
